shortcuts.name: Summarize Page
shortcuts.description: Extracts and summarizes the main content of the current page

shortcuts.name: Summarize Page
shortcuts.description: Extracts and summarizes the main content of the current page

shortcuts.name: Summarize Page
shortcuts.description: Extracts and summarizes the main content of the current page

action.prompt: Please summarize the key content of this page. The page is titled "{pageTitle}" and contains information about Google's search interface in Swedish. Main elements include the Google logo, search bar with AI-läge option, and various footer links related to privacy and settings.

shortcuts.name: Summarize Page
shortcuts.description: Summarizes the main content of the current page

action.prompt: Please provide a concise summary of the current webpage content, including the main purpose, key sections, and important information.

shortcuts.name: Summarize Page
shortcuts.description: Summarizes the main content of the current page

action.prompt: Please provide a concise summary of the current webpage content, including the main purpose, key sections, and important information.

shortcuts.name: Summarize & Create Linear Task
shortcuts.description: Summarizes the current page and creates a Linear task reminder with the summary

shortcuts.name: Summarize & Create Linear Task
shortcuts.description: Summarizes the current page and creates a Linear task reminder with the summary

shortcuts.name: Page Summary & Linear Task
shortcuts.description: Summarizes current page and creates a Linear task reminder with the summary and page link

action.prompt:
I've captured the current page information. Here's what I found:

**Page Title:** {pageTitle}
**URL:** {pageUrl}

**Key Content:**
{mainText}

Now, let me help you create a Linear task reminder. Please provide:
1. Which Linear team should this task go to?
2. What should be the task title? (I can suggest: "Review: {pageTitle}")
3. Any specific priority or due date?
4. Should I add the page URL as a link in the task description?

Or I can create it with defaults if you'd like!
